metadata.title: Siddiqui rejects media claims about govtâ€™s response to PTI demands

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jan 20 (APP):Senator Irfan Siddiqui, parliamentary party leader of PML-N in the Senate and spokesperson for the government's negotiating committee, has refuted media reports claiming that the government committee has finalized its response to PTI's Charter of Demands. In a statement on the social media platform X, Siddiqui dismissed these reports as baseless, clarifying that the seven-party committee is still engaged in mutual consultations and seeking guidance from their respective leaderships. He further stated that preparing a final response could take another week.
